About Kachina Kitchen Kachina Kitchen is a Fast Food restaurant located at 800 S Camino Del Rio in Durango, CO . Kachina Kitchen has been described as an Good Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 5 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, Take Out, American Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
